items.title: New creative dumping ground
items.summary: Hi peeps. As much as I love itch.io, I want to have a sort of backup place to dump all my creative things I make. So, here we are. First thing I'll be uploading is my entry to the NaNoTwiMo jam. Here's a mockup screenshot…
items.content_html:
Hi peeps. As much as I love itch.io, I want to have a sort of backup place to dump all my creative things I make. So, here we are.

First thing I'll be uploading is my entry to the NaNoTwiMo jam. Here's a mockup screenshot to tide you over.

Check back closer to December!
